titleStmt.title: Tvvo sermons delivered at St. Peters in Exeter. By Rychard Pecke, Master of Arts, and minister of Gods word, at Columpton in Devon
Two sermons delivered at St. Peters in Exeter
titleStmt.author: Pecke, Richard.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Harper for Ambrose Ritherdon, and are to bee sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Bull-head,

notesStmt.note: In two parts, each with its own signatures and pagination.
Part 1 has a separate title page, with same imprint, reading: The great day dawning. Or, Christs neerenes to iudgement.
Part 2 has a separate title page, with same imprint, reading: The spirituall plowman. Or, the art of spirituall fallowing.
Errata on verso of [2nd.] E4, final leaf.
Reproduction of the originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library and the Trinity College Library.
